titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase the fuel economy standards used in determining the gas guzzler tax and to increase the rates of such tax.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 6/21/1988--Introduced. Amends gas guzzler tax provisions of the Internal Revenue Code to: (1) revise the fuel economy standards used to determine the tax for automobile model years 1988 and later; and (2) increase the tax rate with respect to these same model years.
